评论详情: A Christmas gift for my granddaughter and she loved it. She is into dinosaurs and while this sweatshirt is certainly Grinchy colors, she loved the Dino prints.
i read the comments prior to ordering and went with XL but a L would have been a perfect fit for me, since XL is large enough to fit like a dress
More oversized but material is very good - it's very soft, cute and comfortable

This has become one of my favorite sweaters. Texture took a little bit to get used to, best way I could describe it is that it’s too smooth, but I get compliments every time I wear it! I got an XL and am 5’8” about 200lbs.
This sweater turns heads.  I get the most compliments when I wear it
Very cute! If I could go a size larger I would but it still looks good

Was this an impulse purchase to support lacking dopamine? Yes…did it disappoint? NO! Hands down the BEST & SOFTEST sweater. I was a little nervous about feedback that it was a little too thick…can only confirm that it’s just right. I get so many compliments, bought it in the lime green and everyone in the corporate world LOVES IT. I did size down just because the top oversized look isn’t my vibe. I. LOVE. IT!
How excited my granddaughter was to get it

Probably the best sweater I’ve bought in a long time. The material is soft and thick, it feels like a blanket! I’m actually going to buy one more in a different color!!! I’m an XL and I could have gone down to a large but I like sweaters big!

评论概述: As cute as everyone says it is!
评论详情: Wrinkly because I just took it out of vacuum sealed bag but SO cute!! The material is soft and heavy-ish like you'd expect in a sweater. I ordered a large while normally a medium because I wanted a baggier look (& also in case it ends up in the dryer by accident!)... very satisfied. Can't wait to wear it out :)

As someone who very likely has tactile defensiveness, I love the feeling of the fabric. It's soft and doesn't make me go "eugh" as orher certain fabric / material does.  Also it's cute! I'm a sucker for dinosaurs! Dinosaurs rock man.
AMAZING SWEATER OMG DINO
This sweater is super cute! It’s well made has a nice weight and definitely worth the price. Expect lots of compliments when wearing 😊
Very cute and comfy I always get compliments on it. It is a thicker material.

评论概述: Nice looking and keeps you warm.
评论详情: Nice looking and keeps you warm. Seems to be good quality and was a good price.
This is my new favorite sweater!! The quality is great and the material is very thick!

The description says the sweater is Polyester and Cotton. Upon receiving this as a gift, I learned it is 50% Nylon, 25% Polyamide, and 25% Polyester. So zero Cotton. I prefer wearing clothes that have at least some cotton in them and this inaccurate statement is disappointing. The sweater itself is a cute design and fits well, so 2 stars for that.
I got this sweater for a coworkers birthday a while back and I was very pleasantly surprised with how soft and durable the material was!

I was looking for functional and cute and it fits.  The sweater has a nice thickness,  is warm enough and fits exactly how I wanted. The material is soft,  but after few washes becomes a tiny bit more stiff. I washed it in a washer in a big mesh delicates baggy and air dried it flat,  so that might be the reason for it.  It is made from synthetic fibers for sure.I am 5'8" and weigh about 115 to 120lbs and usually wear size Small. I ordered a Large, because I wanted an oversized sweater and was really happy with results. Usually the sleeves are too short for me for any tops I get, but this one has nice long sleeves.

I don't write reviews , but felt I should for this one. I read in previous reviews it shrunk in the wash an I typically buy mediums, so I bought a large an it's extra baggy so if it shrinks It will fit like a medium an still be the baggyness I like I'm 5'7 134lbs (60kg)
This sweater is very cute! My teenager loves it!

评论概述: a must-have for your closet, absolutely adorable and comfy.
评论详情: This fit perfectly for me (XL) and the material is super soft. The only problem is that the instruction card that i got on the front of the sweater when it arrived in the package left a dent in the middle when i took it off. Other than that it’s perfect!
Great fit. Nice colors.

评论概述: Fit well but shrank after first wash.
评论详情: Bought this and it was really fun and soft. It fit really well and then shrank after the first wash and I followed the directions and dried on delicate. It still fits but I don't have that small extra bagginess I'd like in a sweater for stretching etc.
Daughter loves the pattern it. Says its warm and comfortable. Its super cute one her
I love this Dino sweater. I pair it with a collar underneath, and it’s pretty. Nice material.
It’s super good quality. It isn’t itchy at all. It didn’t shrink in the wash and is just super comfortable.
My teen daughter loves it!!

omg this is even more adorable than I expected - I'm glad I decided to try this even though I'm normally not a sweater person (this doesnt feel like a normal "old school" sweater... it is SO SUPER SOFT and comfy!!]... definitely a keeper! I do wish I had gone down a size, though.  Update: wore it to church today and everyone loved it - if you like the comfyness of crewneck sweatshirts nut need something a little more "dressy" without being "formal" this is the one!!
Sister loved it super cute

Absolutely love this sweater! It’s made extremely well.
It’s thick and warm and super cute!
I love this sweater got lots of compliments on it was cozy and warm!
I’m 5’6 and 124 lbs. size medium fits really good, it’s also baggy and comfortable.

This sweater is so cute! The quality is great, it’s warm and thick, and it fits as expected. The colors are also so bright and vibrant, and neither did the color or texture change after a wash. Though I do recommend you hang it to dry, not put it in the dryer. I didn’t want mine to shrink so that’s now I did it. Overall amazing sweater, worth the price
I like the dinosaurs on it!!!! So do my friends. It's so cute!

So the entire thing is very cute, I sized up for a bigger look. However there were small holes on the back (possibly stretched yarn? Or just yarn that wasn’t pulled very tightly.) There is also a weird line in the front by the collar.

Pleasantly surprised by the quality of this sweater.  I was dubious as to whether what arrived would be as described / pictured, but I decided to take a chance.  4 starts only because it's a bit overpriced for what it is, but my daughter was delighted with it so for me it was worth it.
I love dinos and the  sweater is very soft but it had a small hole so will send it back and get another. Lg was not baggy enough, so I’ll get xlg next.
Great sweater fits as I expected it too. And doesn’t get too hot

It’s great, colors as shown in photos. Size as expected. Super soft and comfy. I chose XL for an oversized fit, I usually wear a XS/S In women’s. It’s a hit or miss with items on Amazon, this was a definite hit. Very happy.
Granddaughter likes baggy comfy shirts so she loved this. Gave it as a holiday gift and she wore it for days. Material is super soft and stretchy.
This was a gift...they loved it!

I’m a 5’ 3” woman, weight is 160. I bought medium white Dino sweater and I LOVE IT!! It’s soft not itchy. Quality is medium because I can feel I’ll have to take special care to hand wash to maintain the fabric from pilling. Overall I like it because it makes an INSTANT outfit!
just like the pictures :)
Thought this would be cute for my kid. It arrived in a clear plastic bag(not great for gifts), which was open, and it reeks of mold. It will be returned.
